title: How many people live in homes that have been recently renovated?
subtitle: On average, about a quarter of people in the EU live in homes that have been improved to make them more energy efficient.
textNote:
The data on Germany has a low reliability.
Energy efficiency had been improved in the last 5 years, mainly by upgrading of thermal insulation in external walls, roofs, or floors; the replacement of single-glazed windows with double or triple-glazed units; and the installation of more efficient heating systems.
